dcterms:creator: A. Dosovitskiy
G. Ros
F. Codevilla
A. Lopez
V. Koltun
dcterms:description: IBISCape is a simulated benchmark that includes data synchronization and acquisition APIs for telemetry from heterogeneous sensors: stereo-RGB/DVS, Depth, IMU, and GPS, along with the ground truth scene segmentation and vehicle ego-motion. It offers 34 multi-modal datasets suitable for autonomous vehicle navigation, including scenarios for scene understanding evaluation.
dcterms:title: IBISCape

dcterms:creator: J. Sturm
N. Engelhard
F. Endres
W. Burgard
D. Cremers
dcterms:description: The TUM RGB-D dataset is a benchmark for the evaluation of RGB-D SLAM systems, providing various sequences with ground truth data for performance assessment.
dcterms:title: TUM RGB-D

dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
C. Stiller
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset is a comprehensive dataset for vision and robotics research, providing stereo images, 3D point clouds, and ground truth data for various tasks including object detection and tracking.
dcterms:title: KITTI

dcterms:creator: J.-L. Blanco-Claraco
F.-A. Moreno-Duenas
J. González-Jiménez
dcterms:description: The Malaga Urban dataset provides high-rate stereo and LiDAR data in a realistic urban scenario, suitable for evaluating SLAM systems.
dcterms:title: Malaga Urban

dcterms:creator: N. Carlevaris-Bianco
A. K. Ushani
R. M. Eustice
dcterms:description: The University of Michigan North Campus Long-Term Vision and LiDAR Dataset provides a comprehensive set of data for evaluating visual and LiDAR SLAM systems over an extended period.
dcterms:title: University of Michigan North Campus Long-Term Vision and Lidar Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Burri
dcterms:description: The Euroc dataset consists of micro aerial vehicle datasets that provide data for evaluating visual-inertial odometry systems.
dcterms:title: Euroc

dcterms:creator: A. L. Majdik
C. Till
D. Scaramuzza
dcterms:description: The Zurich Urban Micro Aerial Vehicle dataset provides data for evaluating visual-inertial odometry in urban environments.
dcterms:title: Zurich Urban

dcterms:creator: B. Pfrommer
N. Sanket
K. Daniilidis
J. Cleveland
dcterms:description: PennCOSYVIO is a challenging visual-inertial odometry benchmark that provides data for evaluating visual-inertial odometry systems.
dcterms:title: PennCOSYVIO

dcterms:creator: D. Schubert
dcterms:description: The TUM VI benchmark provides data for evaluating visual-inertial odometry systems, offering various sequences with ground truth data.
dcterms:title: TUM VI

dcterms:creator: K. M. Judd
J. D. Gammell
dcterms:description: The Oxford Multi-motion dataset provides multiple SE(3) motions with ground truth for evaluating motion estimation algorithms.
dcterms:title: Oxford Multi-motion

dcterms:creator: J. Delmerico
T. Cieslewski
H. Rebecq
M. Faessler
D. Scaramuzza
dcterms:description: The UZH-FPV drone racing dataset provides data for evaluating autonomous drone racing algorithms.
dcterms:title: UZH-FPV

dcterms:creator: K. Minoda
F. Schilling
V. Wüest
D. Floreano
T. Yairi
dcterms:description: Viode is a simulated dataset designed to address the challenges of visual-inertial odometry in dynamic environments.
dcterms:title: Viode

dcterms:creator: S. Klenk
J. Chui
N. Demmel
D. Cremers
dcterms:description: The TUM-VIE dataset is a stereo visual-inertial event dataset designed for evaluating visual-inertial odometry systems.
dcterms:title: TUM-VIE
